name: List Stores by Category for Dokan
author: Jason Herbert

sections.description:
Dokan Lite plugin and Dokan Pro plugin are required to run this plugin. Post a topic in the support section if you need a compatibility with Dokan starter or Dokan Business.

With List Stores by Category for Dokan include stores list by store category in your pages.

With a simple shortcode you can create wonderful stores list by category using Elementor as well.

With one shortcode for each category, create as many lists as you want in the same page and/or different pages!

If you need some customization or improvement, post a topic in the support section.

How to use List Stores by Category for Dokan

  • After installing the plugin you can use this follow shortcode [stores_list_by_category] in any page to generate the list

  • The default shortcode [stores_list_by_category] will show the list of stores from ‘uncategorized’ category

  • To create a list from a specific category you need to pass an extra parameter inside the short code like this [stores_list_by_category name=”your category name”]

  • Please note that you have to add space if your category name has spaces

  • Category names are case insensetive
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/plugin-name directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

  3. Use this shortcode [stores_list_by_category name=”your category name”] in any page to generate the list
sections.faq:
Does the plugin use dokan store template?

Yes, he uses the dokan store template

Can I create multiple stores lists on the same page?

Yes, you can create several lists.

Can I create multiple stores lists using Elementor?

Yes, you can put the shortcodes in the shortcode widget or directly in the wordpress text editor.

Can I contact plugin author to ask somes specific development ?

Yes, you can contact me at j.herbert@pomgoweb.com for any specific development requests.

sections.reviews:
This plugin has changed my life !

By antoineconnan on October 27, 2021

This plugin is really very practical because sorting on Dokkan was not available. Now, thanks to this plugin, this functionality is easy to set up.

Excellent plugin

By jorgejime2021 on June 19, 2021

The plugin works great, I had a small problem, and the developer was very kind and agile, he solved my problem very fast. Today I have the lists of stores and my site is better.

A highly anticipated plugin

By IGNIS Web (igniscom) on June 9, 2021

I have been looking for this type of plugin for a while, which will really improve the way of sorting products. Thanks to the developer.

short_description: Create quickly and easily a beautiful dynamic Dokan stores list by category for your marketplace website built with Dokan plugin.
